menu.note: Available every Wednesday from 5:00 PM to 9:30 PM

items.name: Veg Dum Biryani
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked on dum with spiced vegetables for a flavorful vegetarian classic.

items.name: Phool Makhana Cashew Pulao
items.description: A light and nutritious pulao made with fox nuts and cashews, perfect for a healthy delight.

items.name: Jack Fruit Biryani
items.description: Tender jackfruit chunks slow-cooked with fragrant spices for a meaty veg biryani experience.

items.name: Egg Biryani
items.description: Boiled eggs layered with spiced rice and herbs, offering a protein-packed biryani treat.

items.name: Pachi Mirchi Boneless
items.description: Fiery green chili boneless chicken biryani, packed with bold Andhra flavors.

items.name: Vijayawada Boneless
items.description: Boneless chicken biryani inspired by the spicy flavors of Vijayawada.

items.name: Chicken Dum Biryani
items.description: Classic Hyderabadi style chicken dum biryani, slow-cooked to perfection.

items.name: Chicken Keema Pulao
items.description: Minced chicken saut√©ed with spices and layered into aromatic basmati rice.

items.name: Yakhni Goat Pulao
items.description: Flavorful goat meat cooked in a spiced broth and blended with basmati rice.

items.name: Goat Paya With Paratha
items.description: Rich and savory goat leg soup served with flaky, buttery parathas.
